meanings.sent1: The circulated story brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent2: The circulated news about the party made everyone excited.
meanings.sent3: The circulated joke at the office made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her circulated kindness warmed the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The circulated rumor turned out to be true.

meanings.sent1: The flu virus circulated quickly through the school.
meanings.sent2: The petition circulated around the neighborhood for signatures.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of freshly baked cookies circulated through the house.
meanings.sent4: Excitement circulated among the fans waiting for the concert.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers circulated in the garden.

meanings.definition: Moved continuously in a closed system
meanings.sent1: The air circulated in the room, keeping it fresh.
meanings.sent2: The water circulated through the pipes in the building.
meanings.sent3: The music circulated throughout the entire house.
meanings.sent4: Energy circulated within the closed loop of the system.
meanings.sent5: The blood circulated through his body, delivering oxygen.
